sense.def:
Kadar je človek
aware of a fact or situation
, ve za tisto dejstvo ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: He was aware that he had drunk too much whisky.
I was quite aware of this before we married.
...the public awareness of the need for conservation.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
aware of something
, ve za nekaj, kar je navzoče ali se dogaja, ker tisto sliši, vidi, voha ali čuti.

seg.quote: Ralph was aware of the heat for the first time.

sense.def:
Kdor je
aware
, opazi, kaj se dogaja okoli njega.

seg.quote: Some people are more politically aware.
